pages.title: Lost Eye
pages.text: $(o)The Restone, even to this day, remains a mystery to us, both in its operation and in its true origin.

An $(l)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/eye_of_ender)Ender Eye$(/l)$() can be imbued with the mysterious energy of $(l)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone)this mineral$(/l)$().$(br2)You have to place them together in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) to create the $(#d42c08)$(l)Lost Eye$().

pages.title: Witch Eye
pages.text: $(o)The Villager's fear and uncertainty of the unknown caused the Witches to leave the Villages.

An $(l)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/eye_of_ender)Ender Eye$(/l)$() can be imbued with the arcane energy of $(l)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/end_remastered/witch_pupil)their pupils$(/l)$() that may be dropped when this creature perish.$(br2)You have to place them together in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) to create the $(#b32eab)$(l)Witch Eye$().

pages.title: Rogue Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)$(#32b14d)$(l)Rogue Eye$()$(o) is hidden inside of the different structures located in the depths of the Jungles over the Overworld.

pages.title: Old Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)$(#daa80e)$(l)Old Eye$()$(o) is hidden inside of the different structures located in the Deserts over the Overworld.

pages.title: Cold Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)$(#13cfd6)Cold Eye$()$(o) is hidden inside of the different structures located in the snowy biomes as the Taigas, Tundras, or Mountains over the Overworld.

pages.title: Black Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)Black Eye$()$(o) is a very rare treasure that some pirates hid.$(br2)May some Villagers will exchange Treasure Maps to help you in your search.

pages.title: Corrupted Eye
pages.text: $(o)The Illagers, being greedy creatures that they are, among their stolen belongings have the $(l)$(#526566)Corrupted Eye$()$(o) stored in their structures.

pages.title: Magical Eye
pages.text: $(o)The Evokers learned the art of necromancy in their Mansions using the $(l)$(#2a9ba1)Magical Eye$() $(o)they possess. They won't give it away so easily, you'll have to get it by force.

pages.title: Guardian Eye
pages.text: $(o)In the depths of the Oceans are the Ocean Monuments where the Elder Guardians dwell. Defeat one of these creatures to get the $(l)$(#ffaa9a)Guardian Eye$()$(o).

pages.title: Wither Eye
pages.text: $(o)The union of Wither Skeletons Skulls forms a powerful creature known as the Wither. You will be able to get the $(l)$(#a4a09f)Wither Eye$()$(o) once you defeat this creature.

pages.title: End Crystal Eye
pages.text: $(o)The End Crystal is the hardest material that you can find in this world.

An $(l)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/eye_of_ender)Ender Eye$(/l)$() can be reforged with $(l)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/end_remastered/end_crystal_fragment)this mineral$(/l).$()$(br2)You have to place them together in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) to create the $(l)$(#de2a95)End Crystal Eye$()

pages.title: Nether Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)$(#923d17)Nether Eye$()$(o) is hidden inside of the Fortress or other structures located over the Nether.
